name: PSYCHOBALL v1.0
description:
Psi-police training is brutal, subjects are forced to battle to the death using psychokinetic power to slam a psychoactive ball (psychoball) into a psychically generated wall.  The more hits, the faster the wall is pushed towards the opponent.  Enough heavy hits will crush them beneath a wave of kinetic power.  Use the arrow keys to maintain control of the psychoball and pound it into the force wall.  Lose control, lose time, lose your life!
Player 1 uses the WASD or Arrow Keys and Space Bar to move and jump/double jump.
Player 2 must use a connected controller that uses the stick for movement and "A" or "X" button for jump.
